text: The Australian cricket team toured Bangladesh between 7 April to 13 April 2011. The tour consisted of three One Day Internationals (ODIs). Michael Clarke was named as the Australian captain, following Ricky Ponting's resignation. ==Squads== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;margin:0 auto" |- ! ! |- style="vertical-align:top" | * Michael Clarke (c) * Shane Watson * Brad Haddin * Ricky Ponting * Cameron White * Michael Hussey * Callum Ferguson * Tim Paine * Steve Smith * Mitchell Johnson * John Hastings * Brett Lee * Xavier Doherty * James Pattinson | * Shakib Al Hasan (c) * Tamim Iqbal * Imrul Kayes * Raqibul Hasan * Shahriar Nafees * Mushfiqur Rahim * Mahmudullah * Suhrawadi Shuvo * Mashrafe Mortaza * Shafiul Islam * Abdur Razzak |} ==Tour match== ===Bangladesh Cricket Board XI vs Australians=== ==ODI series== ===1st ODI=== ===2nd ODI=== ===3rd ODI=== ==References== ==External links== * Series home at ESPN Cricinfo Category:2011 in Australian cricket Bangladesh Category:2011 in Bangladeshi cricket 2011 Category:International cricket competitions in 2011
title: Australian cricket team in Bangladesh in 2011
